name: OCCURRENCE_CODES
description: The EPISODE table contains high-level information on the episodes recorded in clinical system for your patients. When a provider sees a patient several times for an ongoing condition, such as prenatal care, these encounters can be linked to a single Episode of Care.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: REHAB_ONSET_DATE
columns.description: The date of onset of the symptoms being treated in the rehabilitation episode. This corresponds with occurrence code 11 on the claim.

columns.name: PT_CAREPLAN_DATE
columns.description: The date the physical therapy (PT) care plan was established or last updated. This corresponds with occurrence code 29 on the claim.

columns.name: OT_CAREPLAN_DATE
columns.description: The date the occupational therapy (OT) care plan was established or last updated. This corresponds with occurrence code 17 on the claim.

columns.name: SLP_CAREPLAN_DATE
columns.description: The date the speech-language pathology (SLP) care plan was established or last updated. This corresponds with occurrence code 30 on the claim.

columns.name: PT_TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date physical therapy (PT) treatment started. This corresponds with occurrence code 35 on the claim.

columns.name: OT_TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date occupational therapy (OT) treatment started. This corresponds with occurrence code 44 on the claim.

columns.name: SLP_TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date speech-language pathology (SLP) treatment started. This corresponds with occurrence code 45 on the claim.
